message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: @Override
public String toString() {
    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
    Iterator<Map.Entry<BigFraction, BigFraction>> it = knowledgeD.entrySet().iterator();
    while(it.hasNext()){
        Map.Entry<BigFraction, BigFraction> entry = it.next();
        BigFraction key = entry.getKey();
        BigFraction value = entry.getValue();
        sb.append("{").append(key).append(" = ").append(value).append("}");
        if(it.hasNext()){
            sb.append(" to ");
        }
    }
    return sb.toString();
}
<<<explanation>>>: In this code, we are using an Iterator to iterate over the entries of the hashtable. For each entry, we append the key and value to a StringBuilder in the desired format. We also check if there is another entry in the hashtable, and if so, we append " to " to the StringBuilder. Finally, we return the string representation of the StringBuilder.
